div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 575 Vâlĉi trân, Pleven district, Bulgaria, (1153) 1933 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 131+ AR Thasos: 64 spread-flan tetradr. Apollonia, Illyria: 17 dr. Dyrrhachium: 50 dr. Disposition: Sofia 131 Gerasimov, BIAB 8 (1934), p. 468
